amendatorysection.catchline: Surplus lines licensee; policy; information required.
amendatorysection.para: A surplus lines licensee shall stamp or type upon the declaration page of each policy procured and delivered under the Surplus Lines Insurance Act the following information: (1) The licensee's name, business address, and surplus lines license number; (2) the name under which the licensee transacts business if different than the licensee's own name; and (3) the language: This policy is issued by a nonadmitted insurer, and in the event of the insolvency of such insurer, this policy will not be covered by the Nebraska Property and Liability Insurance Guaranty Association.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Property and Liability Insurance Guaranty Association, see section 44-2404.
